message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $160. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. I'm really interested in it, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $150. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and quality.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $140, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stick to my budget. Can you consider $140?
